rooms.description: Spacious living area adjoining the central courtyard, designed with traditional Kerala woodwork and natural light. Vastu principles ensure the room is placed in a commanding direction for social interactions.

Integrated kitchen and dining area with an open layout that connects to both the living space and courtyard. Traditional Kerala-style features include stone accents and natural lighting to promote harmony as per Vastu.
Spacious master bedroom positioned in the northeast sector of the floor plan for positive energy, with private balcony access.
Secondary bedroom with ample storage and windows aligned for optimal natural light as per Vastu norms.
Third bedroom designed to maintain symmetry, ensuring balance in energy flow throughout the home.
Guest room conveniently located near the living area for easy access while preserving privacy. Vastu considerations placed it away from the main entrance.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with carved details, strategically positioned to ensure a welcoming energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.
Open passage leading to the central courtyard, allowing natural ventilation and light throughout the house.
Multiple windows distributed across rooms, ensuring ample natural lighting and adherence to Vastu alignment for energy flow.
